price: 実に敬虔な*者たちには、その主*の御許に安寧の楽園がある。
arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: inna lil'muttaqīna ʿinda rabbihim jannāti al-naʿīmi
